metadata.title: CVE-2021-0342 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In tun_get_user of tun.c, there is possible memory corruption due to a useafter free. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with Systemexecution privileges required. User interaction is not required forexploitation. Product: Android; Versions: Android kernel; Android ID:A-146554327.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
